messages.content: What does the file bsz-cui-extras contain?
The file bsz-cui-extras contains addons for ComfyUI and provides custom nodes for various functionalities.
What is the purpose of the bsz-lo-res-2-hi-res workflow?

The bsz-lo-res-2-hi-res workflow is designed to automatically calculate the appropriate latent sizes when performing a "Hi Res Fix" style workflow, which helps in automatically selecting the best resolution for handling artifacts and inconsistencies in different input textures.
How does the BSZAbsoluteHires node work?
The BSZAbsoluteHires node generates a high-resolution image by setting the desired width and height in pixels for the final high-resolution pass.
